name: LibOpenCM3
tagline: Open-Source lowlevel hardware library for ARM Cortex-M3 microcontrollers (but also M0, M4 are supported and more to come)
body:
### LibOpenCM3
The libopencm3 project (previously known as libopenstm32) aims to create a free/libre/open-source (LGPL v3, or later) firmware library for various ARM Cortex-M3 microcontrollers, including ST STM32, Toshiba TX03, Atmel SAM3U, NXP LPC1000, EFM32 and others.

### Documentation

Up to date information is available in the wiki http://libopencm3.org

from the mailing list [libopencm3-devel@lists.sourceforge.net] (https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/libopencm3-devel)
and the IRC channel (libera.chat, #libopencm3).

Doxygen
-------

Daily updated autogenerated API documentation for developers:

* [master (development branch)] (http://libopencm3.github.com/docs/latest/html)
